rows.label: tev018601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Myles about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Myles about Nelson's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Myles about Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Myles about the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Myles about Lao's betrayal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Myles for his thoughts on
your fight with the Prog Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Those bastards are always getting to the good spots
before us and claiming them for themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0002
rows.name:
That's how I know they'll come back safely.
They're just that good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0003
rows.name:
And THEN they'll tell me to cheer up and not worry
about that Skell I wrecked! Like they're somehow
better than me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0004
rows.name: Ugh. I seriously can't stand those guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Damn Satie. ...I mean, look, I'm glad she had you
rescue me and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0011
rows.name:
But as soon as I get back, all she cares about is what
happened to my Skell. She couldn't give two farts
about what happened to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm not saying I want her worried sick about me
or anything, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0013
rows.name: But maybe a hint of concern would be nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Nelson rubs me the wrong way,
but I've always had respect for his abilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0019
rows.name:
I can't believe his whole team got taken out like that.
Those Prone things must be mighty tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0020
rows.name:
I wonder if that means we're gonna have to defend the
whole city against 'em next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0021
rows.name:
If that's the case, I don't like our odds. But I'll still fight
my hardest to fill in for the good people we lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0026
rows.name: Lao? Sure, every Pathfinder loves a good Lao story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0027
rows.name:
He's constantly traversing the unexplored areas of
Mira and installing data probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0028
rows.name:
That's how he earned his reputation as the ace of the
Pathfinders division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0029
rows.name:
But while he may have me beat when it comes to
exploring and installing probes, I'm confident that
he can't touch my record for wrecking Skells![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0035
rows.name:
You heard how Lao was ordered to guard the restricted
hangar during the attack and ended up ditching his
post, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0036
rows.name:
Because of that, I hear some Skell that we'd worked
really hard to recover ended up getting swiped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0037
rows.name:
The guy may be an ace Pathfinder, but blowing off an
important assignment like guard duty? SMH, man.
...That means "shaking my head," by the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0038
rows.name:
You know what? Next time I see him, I'm just gonna
be like, "Hey, Lao." Won't call him "sir" or nothing.
You think I'm bluffing? I ain't afraid of him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0042
rows.name:
So our former ace Pathfinder is now in the cockpit
of the new Prog Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0043
rows.name:
I don't know who's gonna be able to stop him now.
If you thought we had problems before, this is pretty
much dumping lighter fluid on a tire fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0044
rows.name:
Seriously! Of all the threats we've faced so far,
I don't think any of 'em are as dangerous as that
man in that machine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0045
rows.name:
I could go through a hundred Skells fighting him,
and I doubt I'd even scratch the paint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0050
rows.name:
I hear that even Lao and the Prog Ares were no match
for Team Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0051
rows.name: It galls me to say it, but you're BLADE's ace now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0052
rows.name:
And with Lao out of the picture, we need you to be
twice the BLADE he ever was. So keep doing great
things, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018601_MSG0053
rows.name:
And I'll keep bragging about the day I got a delivery
of provisions from the greatest BLADE of all time![ST:wait ]
